title: FS: V61 Neilson's Chocolate Type 2 George Burns
author: Jason Carota

posts.post_title: FS: V61 Neilson's Chocolate Type 2 George Burns
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING

$15 shipped.  PayPal preferred.  Emails (jason_carota@comcast.net) take priority over posts.

There is a hand-written "7" above the 1 in 1st B, two horizontal surface wrinkles, and a glue or candy stain behind Burn's knee.  The back has minor staining.

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/1901-1939%20Red%20Sox/Misc/v61_1922_neilsons_ser2_burns.jpg[/IMG]

I will take it. Email sent.
                             Thanks,
                                Steve
